Fuseini Yakubu

He was born on the 2nd of April, 1988 at New Atuabo, a suburb within the Tarkwa-Nsuaem Municipality. His parents are Alhaji Saeed and Hajia Hawa.

Career

He started his footballing career with Dynamite Professionals before moving to Arthro FC.

He had an illustrious career at Arthro FC before making a move to Liverpool FC in New Atuabo.

He is tough and very decisive when he has the ball in his possesion.

He had his basic education at John Taylor Municipal JHS, where he captained the school team on several occasions. He then proceeded to St. Augustine's College.

He had his Islamic education at Islamic Training Centre (ITC) where he was elected Sports Prefect for the 2020 year group

He is a member of the Islamic Golden Eleven where he mostly feature as a central or attacking midfielder.

He runs his own football team (Pages FC)

He enjoys playing PlayStation, football and watches wrestling at his leisure time.
